name: Aluna Rift (Demo)
description:
Aluna Rift is a challenging top-down shooter with single player, co-operative and PvP game modes. The game is filled with vibrant visuals, addictive action and scintillating sounds. The main game mode is a mixture between wave-based enemies, random encounter minigames, and hunting colossal bosses. In addition there is an ‘Endless Survival’ mode akin to classic shoot ‘em ups from the golden age of arcade gaming.

Face off against gargantuan foes. Lure behemoth beings out by causing maximum chaos in their vicinity. Overcome the challenge of defeating every boss to prove yourself as the ultimate apex predator.

Slow down time with this advanced evasive manoeuvre. Handy for getting out of a tight spot, assessing the battlefield, or quickly traversing towards a useful item.

Embark on your journey with a friend, or battle them in head to head game modes.

Rift-Warp through time and space in search of your prey. Procedurally generated regions and waves of enemies means an endless exploration of deep space. No two runs are the same.

  • Combat Upgrades
  • Random Encounter Minigames
  • Endless Survival Mode
  • Level Up Your Ship
  • Leaderboards
  • Original Soundtrack by Blackout Noise
  • Ultra Wide Screen Support
  • Gamepad Support
  • Keyboard & Mouse Support

NOTE: This Demo version of the game has a limited amount of features listed above. For the full version, visit the Steam Page.
